argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | subrgss.1 | |- B = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_ressid | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( R |`s B ) = R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_id | |- ( R e. Ring -> R e. Ring ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( R |`s B ) e. Ring ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_ancli | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( R e. Ring /\ ( R |`s B ) e. Ring ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_ringidcl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( 1r ` R ) e. B ) |
| 8 |  | #P_ssid | |- B C_ B |
| 9 | 7, 8 | #P_jctil | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( B C_ B /\ ( 1r ` R ) e. B ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 6 | #P_issubrg | |- ( B e. ( SubRing ` R ) <-> ( ( R e. Ring /\ ( R |`s B ) e. Ring ) /\ ( B C_ B /\ ( 1r ` R ) e. B ) ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 9, 10 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( R e. Ring -> B e. ( SubRing ` R ) ) |
